subject: New York City Marathon
Marathon Running
lead_paragraph: Other than the cyclist Lance Armstrong, Deena Kastor, who broke into prominence at the 2004 Olympics, comes into the New York City Marathon as perhaps its most recognizable name.
snippet: Other than the cyclist Lance Armstrong, Deena Kastor, who broke into prominence at the 2004 Olympics, comes into the New York City Marathon as perhaps its most recognizable name.
